title: Offseason Hype, All-time Breakout Seasons, Jimmy G Future,  and Player Legacies
itunes:title: Offseason Hype, All-time Breakout Seasons, Jimmy G Future,  and Player Legacies
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the hype around the Bills. Hosts Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Will Selva and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson discuss the other teams that should be getting more offseason attention.  Peter delivers his list of all-time breakout seasons and welcomes online criticism!  MikeRob explains why Jimmy Garoppolo will only be a backup QB in the NFL.  The table also debates feeling bad for Daniel Jones and how changing teams can affect a player's legacy.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
